text: department of state commissions and boards functioning within department removals amend rsa to read as follows commissions and boards functioning within department the ballot law commission the boxing and wrestling commission and the joint board of licensure and certification shall each function within the department of state as a separate organizational entity and with all the powers and duties as heretofore provided except as otherwise provided by law boxing and wrestling commission attachment removed amend rsa to read as follows establishment of commission there is hereby established a boxing and wrestling commission which shall oversee amateur and professional fighting sports in the state the commission shall be administratively attached to the department of state pursuant to rsa
